title: FS - 1912 Boston Red Sox Team Postcard Technical Book Publishing
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: FS - 1912 Boston Red Sox Team Postcard Technical Book Publishing
posts.post_content:
For Sale - 1912 Boston Red Sox Team Postcard by Technical Book Publishing.
$750.00 ppd.  Money Order or Cashier's Check.  Thank you.  Jim

In response to several collector questions:

There is a 1/4" X 1/2" piece of tape at the top of the stamp box.

There is a 1/4" X 1/2" paper loss on back top left

There is a vertical crease right side through Bradley

Card has not been trimmed

To my knowledge the card has never been graded

I have had this card for 20 + years.

Thank you.

Jim
Postcard is sold, thank you to all interested parties.  Jim
